segments.text: When could we meet to discuss the project ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will be available on Monday or Tuesday . Choose which day is best for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . Can you come in the morning or would afternoon be best ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! When I check with the others , I will send you an exact time . When you come , be prepared to do your presentation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will be prepared to do my presentation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Who would you like to see there ? Just the sub-committee or should we ask the whole committee ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will probably be best . Do you need help with directions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I know where it is . Maybe you could send me directions just to make sure .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . We will e-mail you all the information you need tomorrow . Have a good day !
segments.speaker: S2
